DOC.brief_summary: To good understand extent family nurse practitioner ( FNPs ) might use research abstract shape clinical decision-making simulated condition . A secondary point examine FNPs might use full-text manuscript ( associate abstract ) make available .
DOC.detailed_description: The study recruit approximate 25 - 1st year 25 - 2nd year family nurse practitioner student Graduate School Nursing . After present overview study inform consent document , elect participate draw seal envelope indicate whether assign group A ( intervention group ) group B ( control group ) . The participant proceed associate room , provide brief clinical case ( appropriate training ) , iPad device pre-loaded EBN-Search engine , questionnaire . The EBN-Search engine intervention group include 9 research abstract associate case . The EBN-Search control group include research abstract full-text version manuscript . The participant provide 20 minute complete questionnaire use information available . The questionnaire require participant indicate treatment plan , respond question regard usefulness research abstract , question regard usefulness full-text ( control group ) recommendation improve EBN-Search .
DOC.criteria: Matriculated family nurse practitioner graduate student USUHS 2010/2011 academic year
